TraitDef.label: Ogre Brutality
TraitDef.description: This Ogre possesses the immense strength and crude nature typical of their kind, excelling in physical tasks but struggling with delicate work.

li.label: Brute Force
li.description: Born with incredible strength but limited intellect, this pawn excels in physical combat and labor.

TraitDef.label: Goblin Cunning
TraitDef.description: This Goblin possesses the natural cunning and mischievous nature of their kind, excelling in stealth and trickery.

li.label: Mischievous
li.description: Born with natural cunning and agility, this pawn excels in stealth, crafting small items, and survival.

TraitDef.label: Dreugh Amphibious
TraitDef.description: This Dreugh possesses the amphibious nature and natural armor of the ancient crab-people, adapted for both land and sea.

li.label: Shell Armor
li.description: Born with natural shell armor and amphibious adaptation, this pawn has enhanced defense and water affinity.

TraitDef.label: Centaur Wild
TraitDef.description: This Centaur possesses the natural speed, archery skills, and wild nature of the horse-people.

li.label: Wild Runner
li.description: Born with the speed of horses and skill of hunters, this pawn excels in archery, movement, and nature knowledge.

TraitDef.label: Giant Strength
TraitDef.description: This Giant possesses the incredible size and strength of their kind, but lacks agility and fine motor skills.

li.label: Colossal
li.description: Born with massive size and strength, this pawn can accomplish incredible feats of physical power but struggles with delicate tasks.
